column4: First time installing Ubuntu (VMWare guest on OS X host system).  Installed Ubuntu Server 10.4.1.  Ubuntu in the VM seems to have no IP address assigned, no matter what type of VMWare networking option I choose.  Can anyone point me in the right direction on how to troubleshoot this?  I'm completely lost.
if I remember correctly server doesn't act as dhcpclient by default   (btw there is a channel #ubuntu-server too :-))
Thanks for both tips.  I'll jump over there.
